name: Interstellar Escape
description:
Dazed and unsure of everything around you including yourself, you find yourself in a spaceship, locked out of the cockpit for an unknown reason with one goal only, unlocking the cockpit and finding some answers. 

You are not alone however! You have a new ally, whom is not with you in person due to it being an artificial intelligence. 

Will you find your true self and find a way out, or will you be stuck here for the rest of your days? Play to find out more.
